segments.text: Good morning , I'd like to open a savings account . Can you tell me on how to go about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . You have to fill out this form and let me see three identification cards or documents .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have my passport with me , a driver ’ s license and a membership card . Will they do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see them . Yes , they ’ re OK .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What ’ s the minimum amount I can deposit in an account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can deposit an initial amount of five dollars .
segments.speaker: S2
